_comment.description: This is the cat test project (for the specification see catjs docs)
_comment.tests: Put in here all of the test scenarios that you wish to run. Enabled only if run-mode set to tests
_comment.scenarios: Declare your scenarios in here and execute them using the 'tests' property

run-mode.all: Execute all available tests (ignores 'tests' and 'scenarios' properties)
run-mode.tests: Executes only the tests specified in the 'tests' property

_comment.ui: Set to true in case you wish to enable catjs ui widget
_comment.report: In case you wish to get a report data set its 'disable' property to false. Currently catjs supports the junit XML format
_comment.test-failure-timeout: This is a timeout for failing the tests in case of general application malfunction. Set the timeout in seconds.
